pullRequest.body:
The file currently uses a mix of these: use the nice unicode character, since we can.


---

nodes.body:
### PR summary [f508318fcb](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/14521/commits/f508318fcb079da23857c4ad6f817a05d5595e65)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

#### Declarations diff

No declarations were harmed in the making of this PR! üêô
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh short <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh <optional_commit>
```
</details>

I'm actually tempted to leave this as `Nat` in case any of this gets upstreamed at some point, where the notation is not avaiable.

@semorrison what do you think here?
That is a reasonable argument, in principle. Note that the file is currently inconsistent about this.

> This PR looks reasonable! A further request from me is that `Stream.Defs` should also be edited.

Done!

I asked Kim and they were fine with this.

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9962393205/job/27526031692)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/9962393205/job/27526032487)

This PR looks reasonable!
A further request from me is that `Stream.Defs` should also be edited.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - chore(Data/Stream/Init): use `‚Ñï` instead of `Nat` consistently

### PR summary [f508318fcb](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/14521/commits/f508318fcb079da23857c4ad6f817a05d5595e65)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

#### Declarations diff

No declarations were harmed in the making of this PR! üêô
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh short <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/no_lost_declarations.sh <optional_commit>
```
</details>

I'm actually tempted to leave this as `Nat` in case any of this gets upstreamed at some point, where the notation is not avaiable.

@semorrison what do you think here?
That is a reasonable argument, in principle. Note that the file is currently inconsistent about this.

This PR looks reasonable!
A further request from me is that `Stream.Defs` should also be edited.

> This PR looks reasonable! A further request from me is that `Stream.Defs` should also be edited.

Done!

I asked Kim and they were fine with this.

bors merge
